snippet: The Americans were 3-3 in the international competition, which was won by Russia and featured a sport that was a forerunner of hockey.
lead_paragraph: The Americans were 3-3 in the international competition, which was won by Russia and featured a sport that was a forerunner of hockey.

headline.main: U.S. Skates to 6th Place in Bandy Tournament
